name: BowlingZ
description:
Play Bowling, Kill Zombies ? This is the place. Either fun and hard, you will be able to play on three bowling lanes to launch balls towards the pins, your ennemies. They will want to eat you and you shall crush them all.

How to play

With Keyboard : Q and D to move, Spacebar to Aim, Charge and Shoot, Left and Right arrows to switch between lanes.

With Controller : Left Joystick to move, A button to Aim, Charge and Shoot, Left and Right bumper to switch between lanes.

Crush Pins to reach the highest score. Red pin gonna destroy all pins on the lane.

Pins remove life if they reach limit of the lane. Once you died, game is Over.

Creators

Code : Edwin Polar

Game Artists : Suigan Aimedée, Emilien Diboine, Cameron Swales.
